channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: You'll Kill the People
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Richard Brister)
item.description: Right after he first appeared on TV, Buddy Burton began to receive warnings: get out while you’re still alive! It didn’t seem to make any sense, but Buddy found that the party sending them mean business, and …
